column4: For some reason, the ms-sys package doesn't exist in Universe anymore.
Is there a similar tool used to restore the Windows boot record?
And on that note, is there a history of Wubi corrupting the MBR?
things like that can happen with Wubi yep
This is arbitrary corruption. I've been running Wubi fine for months
Suddenly, Windows gets a hal.dll corruption issue
Wubi sucks, do a real proper partitioend install instead :)
Unfortunately, that's not possible.
why not?
Because my boss' husband now thinks that Ubuntu corrupts Windows.
And he's fervently pro-Windows. He's unable to accept that Windows could possibly fail on its own.
hmm at  certain computer ignorance
well if Windows goes bad enough,   your Wubi install will as well
Unfortunately, that won't be an issue. I've been told to wipe Wubi away.
So I'll be stuck using a poorly patched XP system now.
buy him a Mac,  at least  then he can blame Apple a well known company, if things go wrong,  :D   oh and you can put Ubuntu on it as well
I'm not the "tech guy," he is.
Though, my knowledge on the subject is far superior to his.
well some people can't be converted, ever, or any time soon, and that's sadly the way  things are
I'm not expecting a conversion. I just wish I could use a working system for the development they expect.
I'm now expected to use Notepad for development.
I know Windows as host, is not that great,  but  maybe do an Ubuntu virtual machine?
I'll see about it. _Hopefully_ he'll allow it.
